attributes.additional_details:
Introduction of national service camps as a mandatory term of a yet to be determined length from the age of 16 or 18.
With which its aims are
1. To instill discipline amongst the rebellious youth of today.

2. To teach people how to look after themselves properly.

3. To Decrease the number of people leaving education to go on benifits.

4. To increase the number of Reserve Troops.

5.To give this nation a firm foundation with which it can rely on.
